X.T: Swing model filtering
X.ST: Using filter objects to reinterpret data and state models

ARTICLE.COMMENT: Using the Decorator pattern to implement filtering in the MVC Swing framework. These filters can be for altering the data, sorting it, removing some part of it or adding some data.

ARTICLE.COMMENT: An introduction to Swing Explorer, a tool to examine the Swing component hierarchy, and FEST-Swing, a library for testing Swing UIs.
